name: Ster
description:
Combine items to make new items with spells. Use the items gathered to defeat the monsters. Get the highest score before the monster bar fills up. This is an inventory mangagement-combaination-item collection - memory game.

Inspiration behind the name: mon-ster - a game about combining items. The two parts of the name separated to be combined again. Defeating monsters is a signifcant component of the gameplay.

How to play

Other Information

  • Controls: Mouse controls
  • Best played with a mouse and sound and fullscreen
Credits

Font: Lemon Milk Font: https://www.dafont.com/lemon-milk.font

Sound assets: Freesound: https://freesound.org/

Music: Mubert: https://mubert.com/
